commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh my goshhhh, the bed feels so nice and soft!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: It's the perfect place to nestle into after warming up in the hot spring.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You did spend a pretty long time in there, Karin.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Well of course. It's a hot spring! It'd be a waste not to spend a while in it.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Not exactly sure what you're wasting...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Anyway, I'm glad I came. My skin is so silky-smooth after that!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! And I'm like, astounded at how good the food is here!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Chuckle* I noticed. I saw you going in for seconds.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Gimme a break! I've never had such fresh fish before. It's completely different when you're right by the ocean!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: The food's delicious, there's a hot spring to dip in, and the beds are fluffy to boot! It's like we're staying at a ryokan inn.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That's because we are!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, right! Duh!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: But is it really okay for us to have such a nice experience all to ourselves?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I know what you mean. I wish everyone could've come with us, too.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm really sorry we didn't have enough rooms.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I would have let you all stay at my family's hotel if we had any rooms free.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't beat yourself up over it! Speaking of which, is it really okay that we're staying here for free?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Totally! Don't worry about it.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Uh-huh, Chika will work our debt off for us later.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Thanks, Chika.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You're very welcome... Wait, what?!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I feel like I'm on cloud nine right now.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Right?! I couldn't be more satisfied!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hey! Now's not the time to get all settled down! We're not just here to have fun.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: In the end, we were unable to produce any good ideas for a slogan during our meeting earlier today.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: It sure is hard to run an event.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Yeah, I do want to make some progress during this camp, but it looks like it's gonna take a while.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: We've still got so much we need to cover. Is this really okay?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: It's kinda not okay, zura.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It's fine! I'm sure we'll come up with a good slogan by tomorrow!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: We're running out of time, so maybe we should save it for later? We should define our priorities and consider the most efficient course of action.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, right! Maybe we should just change our whole approach.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: What do you mean by that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, we've just kinda been going back and forth trying to figure out how we're gonna do this, that, and the other thing, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's all well and good, but maybe we should try forgetting about that for now?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's try approaching this from a different perspective. What would be fun? The attendees aren't gonna have fun if we're showing them something we wouldn't enjoy ourselves.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Fun is infectious, you know. So we've got to party it up to really get things started!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Fun is infectious...?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's stop thinking about what we can or can't do and take turns saying things we want to do instead!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Something I want to do... Well, I'd love to have another dance contest. But this time, I'd like to do it in front of a much bigger crowd!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Don't think I'll let you off easy this time, either.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: In that case, I wouldn't mind having another horror competition. How about you, Kana?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'll win this time, too!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I want to see another joint 's and Aqours performance!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Now that's an awfully silly thing to say. After all, your school will be participating with us this time.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: That's right! It'll be a joint live show with all three schools!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Whaaat?! B-But what kind of song could we all sing together?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It might be fun if we all came together to write a song.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: In that case, I want to wear matching costumes with everyone.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Me too! I really want to make those costumes!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I want to sing with all the other school idols and everyone who comes to support us. I want the whole world to know just how fun school idols are!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: *Chuckle* Man, I'm getting excited just thinking about it!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Yeah! This sounds like so much fun, zura!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I'd love to have a live show with everyone there!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Chuckle* This is much more lively than our earlier conversation.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Is this what you meant by saying fun is infectious?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Exactly. We just have to enjoy what we're doing, first and foremost.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I wonder what kind of event we'd end up with if we managed to actually do all of our suggestions?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: That's it! That's what we'll do! We'll do all of it!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: What? I don't know if we can manage all of that...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, I agree with her. I'm not gonna let up on this. I'm gonna make sure you all get to do what excites you most! I want to make all your dreams come true! That's why I'm here!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Well, if that's what you want, then that's what I want too. I want to hold a School Idol Festival that only we could pull off!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Me too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You know what? I think I've figured out a slogan for the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I think maybe everyone here has now.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Sure have!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I think we are all on the same page!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Honoka and co.
commands.line: Where All of Our Dreams!

commands.speaker: Ayumu and co.
commands.line: Come Together!

commands.speaker: Chika and co.
commands.line: And Shine!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's what it is to us!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Exactly! That's why it just has to be our slogan!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Come Together, Dream Together!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's an awesome slogan! Let's make everyone's dreams come true, together!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
